betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Polyethylene is a useful Plastic. Being the first plastic you can make its not to difficult to produce and since you have Heavy Fuel from Oilsands making this should be easy.

There are quite a few recipes to produce Ethylene but the easiest one you can do, Unless you obtain oil from some other means is to send the Heavy Fuel in a Chemical Reactor with some steam on circuit 3, This will result in Severly Steam-Cracked Heavy Fuel.

Next Send the Severly Steam-Cracked Heavy Fuel through a Chemical Reactor with Circuit 10 to produce Ethylene. Now that wasn't to hard was it?

Sending Ethylene Through a Chemical Reactor With some Oxygen or Air Produces Polyethylene!
